casebody.data:
No. 94,

Orig.

South Carolina v. Regan, Secretary of the Treasury. [For earlier order herein, see 462 U. S. 1114.]

Motion of the defendant for leave to file a supplemental memorandum granted. Motion of the plaintiff for leave to file a supplemental memorandum granted. Motion of plaintiff and Texas for divided argument granted. Motion of National Association of Counties et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted.
